channel.title: Gogol Bordello
channel.description:
get on this gypsy punk, it's best
Oh no: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CE8lYA3zWgU
Wonderlust king: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=elyQ4ShVw-Y
immigrant punk: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=maocOiES-Mo
American Wedding: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o76YbAfFfJ8
Start wearing purple: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sM1Ahn0Osjo
not a crime: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PFL2SXGdrVA
your country: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AguFIRq0R6U
this is what real people mosh to

item.title: Gogol Bordello
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Holic, post:6, topic:332227”][quote author=jme link=topic=428666.msg3147600#msg3147600 date=1268238614]

I fucking love these guys. Perfect partying around a campfire music. rep++!!!

Haha yeah you’re from BC of course you would love gogol! That’s where I found out about them and I saw him live in vancouver
[/quote]
Haha too true. When did you see them?[/quote]

Honestly I couldn’t tell you. Sometime between october or november

Read full topic
